title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.285 - Referred outpatient
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.285 - Referred outpatient

State Regulations

An outpatient who is referred by his private physician to
the institution for diagnosis or treatment on a ambulatory basis. The
responsibility for medical care remains with the referring
physician. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.285

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
